name: Attempt to update a non-existing customer
scenarioId: update_customer:Attempt to update a non-existing customer
methodName: Attempt to update a non-existing customer

testSteps.description: Given I am connected to the service

When I update a customer with ID 9999 with the following data:
| name | email | phoneNumber |
| John Doe | john@example.com | 1234567890 |

children.description: usuario executes a PUT on the resource /customers/9999

testSteps.description: Then The update response status code should be 404
And The update response should contain an error message "Error: El cliente con ID 9999 no existe."
